conclusion: To solve this problem, we need to analyze the flow of liquid through the depicted baffles and predict which container (D or E) the liquid will flow into after passing through the baffles.
The liquid flows from point A, B, and C towards point D.
The liquid flows through the baffles from point A to point B, then from point B to point C, and finally from point C to point D.
Since the liquid flows from A, B, and C towards point D, it will flow into container D.
Verify that the flow direction matches the path through the baffles, confirming that the liquid will indeed flow into container D.
